items.title: France plans to replace Microsoft Teams and Zoom with French-made and Outscale-hosted Visio by 2027, as part of a push to drop US software vendors in government (Pascale Davies/Euronews)
items.summary:
Pascale Davies / Euronews:
France plans to replace Microsoft Teams and Zoom with French-made and Outscale-hosted Visio by 2027, as part of a push to drop US software vendors in government  —  France announced that it will roll out the Visio platform across all government departments by 2027.

items.title: Segway drops premium Xyber electric bike to $3,000 ($300 off), while the Xafari e-bike is down at its $1,800 low ($600 off)
items.summary:
Right alongside the Lumina and Cube power station savings we spotted, Segway has now dropped the price on its Xyber Electric Bike to $2,999.99 shipped, alongside the ongoing discount for the Xafari Electric Bike at $1,799.99 shipped. Since the release of the brand’s newest Myon e-bike from CES 2026, we’ve been seeing more frequent discounts on these two models from their $3,300 and $2,400 price tags, with the Xafari having been keeping down at its all-time $1,800 low since previous holiday sales, and the Xyber e-bike instead dipping in and out of discounts, with it landing at the second-lowest price here today, complete with $300 savings.

more…

items.title: Google expands Android's anti-theft suite, including a dedicated toggle for its Failed Authentication Lock feature on devices running Android 16 or later (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
items.summary:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Google expands Android's anti-theft suite, including a dedicated toggle for its Failed Authentication Lock feature on devices running Android 16 or later  —  Google on Tuesday announced an expanded set of Android theft protection features, designed to make its mobile devices less of a target for criminals.

items.summary:

Google adds Gemini 3 to AI Overviews as the default model globally and now lets users ask follow-up questions “seamlessly” via AI Mode  —  Gemini 3 is coming to AI Overviews and you can ask follow-ups for a ‘seamless Search experience.’  —  Google is making Search less about links and more about AI.

items.title: EcoFlow 48-hour flash sale drops expanded 4,096Wh DELTA 2 Max power station to second-best $1,399, more from $459
items.summary:
As part of the soon-to-end EcoFlow Disaster Winter Storm Sale, the brand has launched a 48-hour flash sale to ride parallel with the full lineup of savings through its slated end date tomorrow night (with no telling if things will be extended). Among this lineup, a standout is the popular DELTA 2 Max Portable Power Station with a Smart Extra Battery at $1,399 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing by $300. This bundle carries a $3,298 tag with it directly from EcoFlow, but can more often be found at Amazon only climbing as high as $2,149, though recently it’s been keeping down at $1,699 after riding out December lower at $1,499. If you missed out on a recent fall to the $1,349 low, you’re looking at the next-best price we have tracked while this deal lasts, giving you up to $750 of savings off the recent going rates we’ve seen over the last few months. Head below to learn more about this package and browse the three other flash offers while they’re still around.

items.title: Anker extends SOLIX Winter Sale’s up to 65% power station savings – F3800 unit at $1,799 low, more from $150

Prices have been updated below. We also recently dropped our hands-on review of the Anker SOLIX C2000 Gen 2 Power Station here.

Anker SOLIX is joining its competitors in bringing back previous holiday savings in the form of its latest Winter Sale that is offering up to 65% discounts and FREE gifts with select units. One unit I want to point out is Anker’s SOLIX F3800 Portable Power Station at $1,899 $1,799 shipped, which matches the price we’re seeing at Amazon, though be sure to clip the on-page 5% off coupon. It may have a $3,999 MSRP direct from the brand, but at Amazon you can find it starting between $2,399 and $2,599. It’s mostly been keeping above $2,000 since December, which is when we saw the $1,799 low from Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales rise in price. You’re looking at the next-best rate today that even beats out the previous New Year sale by $100, with $700 struck from the going rate ($2,100 off the MSRP), making this quite the surprise offer. Head below to check out the full lineup for Anker’s SOLIX Winter Sale while it lasts through the week.

items.title: Anker’s 250W Prime 6-port GaN charging station with a customizable display drops to lowest price at $100
items.summary:
Courtesy of Anker’s official Amazon storefront, you can now score the brand’s 6-port 250W Prime charging station for $99.99 shipped. This is a display-equipped charging unit that typically goes for $150, so you’re looking at a straight-up $50 discount on it at the moment. It first dropped to this price during last year’s Prime Day sale, which it also hit more recently during the brand’s holiday sale. Today’s deal marks the return of that lowest price with a 33% markdown, making this a great time to cash in and snag one for your desk. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Most affordable 24GB M4 Mac mini you can’t buy on Amazon is $100 off right now
items.summary:
While the AirPods 4 and Pro 3 deals are flowing this morning, alongside availability on the new AirTag 2 at $29 Prime shipped, the Mac mini deals are still flowing. Alongside the entry-level model down at $499 on Amazon, we wanted to highlight the 24GB model you can score at B&H at $100 off as well – this is the most affordable 24GB config in the lineup and one that might be flying under your radar as it is not available on Amazon.

items.title: New low knocks Samsung’s 27-inch Odyssey G6 350Hz QHD gaming monitor down to $350 today
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Samsung’s Odyssey G6 (G60F) 27-inch 350Hz gaming monitor down to $349.99 shipped. Regularly $500, this QHD gaming monitor is now seeing a $150 discount. Samsung is still listing it at the full price, but Amazon’s 30% discount knocks it $50 below its previous all-time low. This marks a new best to beat for this display, making it a great option if you’re looking to upgrade your battlestation. Head below for all the details.
